0.name: An overturned cart
desc: "   You have come across an overturned cart, lying in the middle of the
road.  One of the wheels is still spinning.

1.name: Ambush!
1.desc: "   Suddenly, a group of bandits leap from cover and attack!

3.name: A small path in the woods
desc: "   You are standing on a small path in the woods.  To the east, the
path leads further into the forest, while to the west, you can
still see the cart, lying on the road.

4.name: A small path in the woods
desc: "   The path turns north now.. You can hear shouts from up ahead,
You must be almost upon the bandit camp!

5.name: Empty Camp
desc: "   As you tear through the woods, you stumble out into a large
round clearing.  There is a fire burning in the center of the
grassy area, clearly it was just recently vacated.  Watch out for
another ambush!

6.name: Ambush!
desc: "  Once again, the bandits jump from hiding, but this time there are
several more of them, including the leader, a huge ogre...

7.name: A small clearing
desc: "   You are standing in a large circular clearing in the forest.  There is a
small fire still burning in the center of the clearing

8.name: A small path in the woods
desc: "   You are standing on a small path in the woods.  The path
leads north and east.  To the north is the bandit camp
you just left, and to the east is the overturned cart.

9.name: A small path in the woods
desc: "   You are standing on a small path in the woods, leading east
and west.  To the east you can see an overturned cart

10.name: An overturned cart
desc: "   You are standing next to an overturned cart.  The wheels
have ceased turning, and all is quiet

13.name: Another small trail
desc: "   You are standing on another small trail leading east and west.
You hear movement to the west

14.name: A shallow pit
desc: "   You have stumbled across the (modest) treasure of the bandits.
Of course, you'll have to get past the guardian first.

exits.info: door, closed, locked, secret, pickproof, hidden, autoclose, autolock
